## PuzzleSession.getInvalidCells() method

Gets all of the currently invalid [cells](./ts-sudoku-lib.icell.md) in the puzzle.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getInvalidCells(): ICell[];
```
**Returns:**

[ICell](./ts-sudoku-lib.icell.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of [ICell](./ts-sudoku-lib.icell.md) with all invalid cells.
